name: MagneMagia
description:
FULLSCREEN STRONGLY RECOMMENDED

Race to the top of the tower using your magnetic charm!  

Magnetics can be unstable and polarizing - and you must use all your wits and charm to get to the top. Using only your magical magnetic witch hat, jump and use your attractive skills to make it through all 10 levels! What is at the top? Why do you need to get there? You will only know if you use Magnemagia. 

W A S D to move
Space to jump

Right Mouse Button and drag: Increase a magnet's range so you can be pulled towards it

Left Mouse Button: Draw a magnet (attached to a platform) towards you

CREDITS:

Sarah Jayne Assmus - https://sasstron.itch.io/

Vladimir Karashchuk - https://offworlddemon.itch.io/
